definition: fortune telling by unpicking Chinese characters
to tear open/to tear down/to tear apart/to open
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China

sentences.english: So, obviously, home in chinese had certain relation with piggery in ancient time.
sentences.chinese: 用拆字先生的辦法，望文生義，家最初和豬圈有關。

definition: table of components used in wubi input method 五筆輸入法|五笔输入法[wu3 bi3 shu1 ru4 fa3]
component of a Chinese character (as the radical or the phonetic part)
old character/archaic form of a Chinese character
five stroke input method for Chinese characters by numbered strokes, invented by Wang Yongmin 王永民 in 1983
abbr. of 五筆字型|五笔字型, five stroke input method for Chinese characters by numbered strokes, invented by Wang Yongmin 王永民 in 1983
a Chinese character formed by combining existing elements - i.e. a combined ideogram 會意|会意 or radical plus phonetic 形聲|形声
Chinese character/CL:個|个[ge4]/Japanese: kanji/Korean: hanja/Vietnamese: hán tự
